attributes.action: Decrease MPs salary by 10% with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details: In the present economic climate MPs should put the country and people less fortunate than themselves first and accept a 10% decrease in salary. The money saved should be used to help those in most need.
attributes.background: Decrease MPs salary by 10% with immediate effect.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
